sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Enforces the READ ACL check when there is no RVACLs on aggregated reporting execution</description> <name>Enforce READ ACL when No RVACL reporting</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function(){ if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) return;
gs.setProperty("glide.report.report_view.read_acl", "enforce", "Enforces the READ ACL check when there is no RVACLs on aggregated reporting execution");
})();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-23 13:11:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b786a326b7021110f3769188ce11a96e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Enforce READ ACL when No RVACL reporting</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f37</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b786a326b7021110f3769188ce11a96e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-23 13:11:56</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Enforce READ ACL when No RVACL reporting
